trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Willoughby
There were no other sightings in Willoughby on or around October 4th 2008
divs: Sighting DetailsIt was a clear cool night, we went to the Lake Erie shore at Osborne park to get away from the city lights to view the stars. We noticed blinking lights to the north about 30 degrees above the horizon. The lights were varying in color and stationary for the 10 minute duration we were there. The kids were cold so we left after about 10 minutes. It apperaed to be at a distance of 10 miles or so. Witnessed by myself, my lady friend Maria and my son 8 and daughter 9.
